column5: With the lingering winter ice conditions, I am wondering what happens to folks that booked early and unable to fish?? Do outfitters allow credit (future trip) or refund money?? Do they get notified before drive to camps? Curious Freytown.
Most outfitters will notify the parties before they make the trip and credit their deposits to another trip that yr or the next. It does not happen often but does happen.
Thxs Ron, that's good to hear!
I saw a story here where an outfitter I used in 2013 let a group drive all the way up without calling them. Sent from my SM-G935T using Tapatalk
